name: 罗科·戈特利布
name_full: 罗科·戈特利布  Rocco Gottlieb
introduction: Rocco Gottlieb was born in Genoa, Italy but due to his Canadian origins, he is fluent in both Italian and English. Rocco is best known for his debut film, 'Book of Vision,' which was produced by Terrence Malick. The movie opened the Venice Film Festival Critics' Week in 2020. In addition to this, he's had roles in two more series, Masantonio in 2020 and Blanca in 2021. Rocco is passionate about playing the piano and dancing hip-hop. Although he loves acting, Rocco's ultimate goal is to pursue a career in directing.
